A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Spoiler alert— I have to admit I left the movie scratching my head wondering what my true feelings were about this movie. I consider myself a passionate Star Wars fan. Yes\, I won’t deny I had certain expectations for how I wanted things to go in this movie. Who Rey is\, Luke’s power of the force\, etc... But the more I think about how things did not go the way I wanted the more I appreciate it. If you want the same thread to just keep repeating over and over again with new characters in new outfits then you are not going to like this installment. If you instead want the force and it’s intentions to evolve then you will understand why they did what they did. It may not be popular to many hardcore fans but if you look at it from a different viewpoint you will get it.
